document.discussion_title: General Aviation Chatter • Cessna crash at Rand Airport
document.topic_text: Joined: Fri Sep 19, 2014 1:26 pm Closest Airfield: Johannesburg Int Cessna crash at Rand Airport Unread post by FithCobra65 » Mon Aug 22, 2016 10:00 am Hi everyone there was a cessna that crashed at Rand Airport on the 21st of August after the airshow. Was eating at Harvard cafe when it happend. Any info on the cause and if everyone on board are ok.Regards Sheldon Joined: Mon Mar 05, 2007 5:53 pm Closest Airfield: FALA Unread post by Ryan Beeton » Mon Aug 22, 2016 10:01 am FithCobra65 wrote: Hi everyone there was a cessna that crashed at Rand Airport on the 21st of August after the airshow. Was eating at Harvard cafe when it happend. Any info on the cause and if everyone on board are ok.Regards Sheldon Heard it on radio when I was taxiing RV back to hangar - hope all ok. RV Raptors Aerobatic Team #2
